summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the SiteRankFeatures Smart Analysis flow. All 12 features tested and working correctly: role selection (owner/agency/research), URL entry, analysis results with score ring and sub-scores, role-specific features (Generate Fixes for owner, Export Report for agency, Intelligence Mode for research), tab switching (SEO/Speed/Content), and navigation (back button, NEW button).
passed_tests: Role selection page loads correctly at /smart-analyze with 3 role cards (owner, agency, research)
Clicking 'I own this website' navigates to URL entry step
Owner role shows 'COPY-PASTE FIXES + CMS' badge
Clicking 'This is a client's website' navigates to URL entry step
Agency role shows 'EXPORTABLE CLIENT REPORT' badge
Clicking 'This is a competitor's website' navigates to URL entry step
Research role shows 'INTELLIGENCE ONLY' badge
URL input field accepts text input
ANALYZE button is disabled when URL is empty
ANALYZE button becomes active when URL is entered
Back button (← BACK) returns to role selection from URL entry
Analysis results show animated score ring with score value
Analysis results show sub-scores (On-Page SEO, Technical SEO, Content Relevance, Link Structure)
Analysis results show issues found with impact points
Owner mode shows OWNER badge in results header
Owner mode shows 'GENERATE AI FIXES' button
Agency mode shows AGENCY badge in results header
Agency mode shows 'EXPORT REPORT' button in header
Research mode shows RESEARCH badge in results header
Research mode shows 'INTELLIGENCE MODE — VIEW ONLY' badge instead of Generate Fixes
Research mode shows COMPETITIVE INTELLIGENCE section with insights
Tab switching to Speed Metrics works - shows score 72 with Performance, Core Web Vitals, Resource Optimization, Server Response sub-scores
Tab switching to Content Score works - shows score 74 with Word Count, Readability, Keyword Usage, Content Structure sub-scores
Tab switching back to SEO Analysis works
NEW button (← NEW) in results header returns to role selection
Loading indicator shows analysis progress steps (Connecting, Parsing HTML, Checking meta tags, etc.)
Generate AI Fixes button triggers fix generation with 'GENERATING FIXES...' loading state
critical_code_review_comments: SiteRankFeatures.jsx properly uses data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Component correctly implements 3-step flow: role → url → results
Role-based conditional rendering works correctly (Owner gets fixes, Agency gets export, Research gets intelligence)
Demo/mock data fallback works when real API calls fail - intentional behavior
Tab switching triggers analysis for each category (SEO/Speed/Content) on first click
Score ring animation provides good visual feedback
Loading states with progress steps provide good UX during analysis
test_credentials: None required - Smart Analysis accessible without login
context_for_next_testing_agent: SiteRankFeatures Smart Analysis flow fully functional. Uses DEMO data and FIXES arrays as fallback when real API calls fail (intentional). Key test IDs: role-card-owner, role-card-agency, role-card-research, url-input, analyze-btn, generate-fixes-btn, export-report-btn, tab-seo, tab-speed, tab-content, back-to-role-btn, new-analysis-btn, loading-indicator, analysis-results, fixes-section, intelligence-section. Note: Fix generation has ~1.8s simulated delay when using demo data.

features: Owner Mode banner in fixes section
Agency Mode banner in fixes section

mocked_data_note: The component uses DEMO data and FIXES arrays as fallback when real API calls fail. This is INTENTIONAL behavior for demo purposes. Analysis data and fix generation will use mock data when backend APIs are unavailable.
